name: Artist Master:Studio Simulator
description:
Artist Master is a pixel art styled simulator game, it takes players back to the Middle Ages in Italy during the Renaissance. Players need to build their own art studio, cultivate talents and take various quests from their clients, gain reputation and make it a world known studio. Experience the hardship and pleasure of creation, share the most inspired moments in the creative process. As this way to show the respect to all artists in the human history.


FEATURES:

----Pixel Styled----
The classic pixel styled game,it reminds you these old school games as they bring back sweet childhood memories that stick for life.

----Renaissance----
The story takes place all over the Europe during Renaissance, makes you experience different urban artistic cultures.

----Simulation----
Players build their own studio, earn golds and expand the business by taking orders or investments, create a masterpiece and gain the reputation.

----Customized Costumes----
customize your characters and makes them always unique with more than ten thousand combinations, all the costumes are in European classical style.

----Artist Simulator----
Find and cultivate talents from street artists, Van Gogh, Michelangelo, Picasso and all those big names could be in your studio.

----Art Collection----
Many world famous art treasures and masterpieces will be born in your studio, and a lot of more mystery art works waiting for you to accomplish.

If you like this game or have tips to share with others please like the page or find us on: https://www.facebook.com/ArtistMastergame/
